data.text:
Hello,

My current store is based in Serbia (outside of Shopify). It's Cash on delivery only. Serbia uses Serbian Dinars (RSD). Now I'm trying to add Montenegro as a second market, they use Euro. Again Cash on delivery only.

When I add Montenegro as a second market, it doesn't let me change the currency from Serbian Dinars to Euros because "Shopify payments" are not supported in my country. I just need the currency to show prices in Euros for Montenegro, I don't need a payment provider.

Is Shopify the right solution for my e-commerce store? What should I do?
